params.attack: Unstoppable **R A M P A G E**

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, a random player is selected to be Senpai. They will know this and receive 3 names, one of them being yours
- If Senpai dies, you become violent and able to attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: You win with town if Senpai is alive. Otherwise, kill everyone.
